Texts.Chs: 尝试制作一些更基本的物品，例如^orange;线圈、电路板^reset;，或者极其有用的^orange;物质萃取器^reset;。物质汇编机对于每个人都是^orange;必备^reset;的。
Texts.Eng: Try building a few more basic goods such as a ^orange;coil, circuitboard^reset; or an extremely useful ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. The Matter Assembler is necessary for ^orange;every FU crafting station^reset;. Use it well.

Texts.Chs: 你已经成功的在^cyan;Frackin'Universe^green;中迈出了第一步。利用^orange;物质汇编机^reset;你可以制作^orange;各种实验设备^reset;，以及^green;各种资源^reset;。那让我们先制作^orange;5个铜线^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: You've taken your first steps in ^cyan;Frackin' Universe^reset;. With the ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset; you will branch out into a wide assortment of ^orange;Lab Stations and Equipment^reset; as well as ^green;crafting resources^reset;. Let's start by making ^orange;5 wire^reset;.
